subject: The United States is not the only place where the Presidency is changing...
header: Last week brought an end to a long election season in the US, and the end of an era for The Perl Foundation, as President Karen Pauley steps down. Big news, certainly, but there are, of course, other things going on, too!

entries.title: the times they are a-changing

entries.text: Karen Pauley steps down from the Presidency of TPF
